content: I don't have another account that uses my phone number and I get this error message.  Can I get help verifying?

Hello <@1274836011188359179> it is likely that you have an "accidental" second account. Here are the instructions for fixing this issue
https://discord.com/channels/1242249109298221066/1284912441981010043
I appreciate it is a bunch of steps and details. If you prefer to do this over a zoom screenshare, I am available on Zoom after 1:30p easter time today.
I did it and now I don't have all the tabs for texting (campaigns, questions, etc.).  How do I get them back?
and my direct messages also disappeared

I sounds like you are now logged in on the "accidental account" if you go to your Account settings you can remove your phone number, then log into the other account and add your phone number and you will have everything back.
I sent you a DM, we can finish this up there.
